dc:title: Security
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Summary: A passionate rejection of the false security of wages and the maxim "Be moderate, be prudent." Instead she promotes the counsels and precepts of the gospel in this time of world-wide crisis for religion and poverty. She asks, "What right has any one of us to have security when God's poor are suffering?"
